text: I'm going to show you a picture now. It has a lot of action going on in it. What I want you to do is to tell me all that you see going on in the picture. Tell me what's going on in the picture. And there's the picture. Just say out loud what you see going on in the picture. Okay. The boy's going for the cookie jar and the mother's washing the dishes. Anything else? What else is going on?
